article_title: Why didn't I get my gold from a Sponsor's offer?

structured_content.content: Craving some free gold? Well, our Cash Shop is the gold mine you're looking for! Just scroll to the bottom, and voila! You can take on sponsor offers for some dazzling free gold. It's like a treasure hunt, but without the need to get your hands dirty!
But what if you've completed an offer and your gold is nowhere to be found? Fear not, we've got a map to guide you:

See, we at Highrise are great at many things, but handling gold from sponsors isn't our forte. So, you'll need to get in touch with the parent company, like Tapjoy or Fyber (not the game itself, like Mobile Strike). Luckily, you can reach them without leaving Highrise. Here's the secret path:
Tap 'shop' (it's hiding in the bottom right-hand corner).
At the shop, choose 'cash store'.
Now, scroll down to the very bottom where the offerwall partner offers are hanging out. Instead of a price, you'll see a welcoming 'Go'.
Hit 'Go' for the provider you used (like hitting the bullseye!).
If your provider was IronSource, click 'in-progress'. If it's Tapjoy, hit the three lines in the top left corner and choose 'Reward Status'.
Tap on the offer that's still holding your gold hostage.
On the bottom left of this page, there's a 'missing gold' button. Give it a tap.
In the bottom left of the next page, you'll find a 'contact support' option. Tap this to send a support ticket to our offer partner. They'll play detective and help you unearth your missing gold.
Remember, the 'contact support' option will only appear after 24 hours on an 'in-progress' offer. So give them the lowdown on your gold woes, and they'll be on the case! Happy gold-digging!

article_title: Why are Gold Bars more expensive than Gold?

structured_content.content: Ever wondered why Gold Bars carry a heftier price tag than Gold in Highrise? Well, it's time to spill the secrets:
Gold Bars come with a 10% premium, like adding truffle oil to your french fries. So, if you're buying a 500G Gold Bar, it'll cost you 550 Gold from your vault. Why the price hike, you ask? Well...
Gold Bars are the social butterflies of our virtual world; they love to be traded! Meanwhile, Gold prefers to stay put, a tad shy about being traded.

The extra cost of Gold Bars is like a superhero fighting inflation in Highrise. How? Well, every time a Gold Bar changes hands, it shape-shifts back into Gold, and poof! Gold vanishes from the economy. Fewer Gold floating around means lower prices for items. A win-win, right?

But wait, there's more! Gold Bars aren't just a currency; they're also fashionable decor! Want to flaunt your wealth or just looking for that perfect metallic touch for your room design? Gold Bars are ready for their close-up! So, they're not just pricier, but also fancier‚Äîa premium currency, if you will.
So, now you know the tale of why Gold Bars cost more. They're more than just shiny objects; they're the life of the party in Highrise's bustling economy!

article_title: Inbox Optimizations

structured_content.content: With our latest optimizations, managing your messages is now easier and more efficient. Whether you're looking to highlight important messages, amend previously sent ones, or tidy up your chat history, these new features bring a wealth of possibilities right to your fingertips. Let‚Äôs dive into the details!
Pinning a message allows you to highlight important messages at the top of your chat, making them readily accessible.
Simply tap and hold the message you wish to pin, then select "Pin Message" from the menu. This will secure the message at the top of your conversation, marked with a pin iconüìå

You can pin text messages, media messages, invites, and more. The general rule is that it is most likely pinnable if it's sent from another user. Messages sent by us like your event placements are not.
You can pin up to 50 messages in any chat type, including group and crew chats.
Tap on the pinned message or the pin icon near the top of the chat to open a slide-up panel displaying all pinned messages.
Unpinning a message will remove it from the pinned messages panel. If there are other pinned messages, the next most recent one will be displayed at the top.
To delete a message, tap and hold it, then choose "Delete Message" from the action menu. Confirm your decision in the popup alert.
You can delete text messages and invites. Messages integral to group management or trade confirmations cannot be deleted to preserve chat integrity.
Deleted messages are replaced with a placeholder text "deleted a message." This helps indicate where conversations have been modified.
You can edit text messages within 15 minutes of sending them. After this period, the edit option will not be available.
Press and hold the message, then select "Edit" from the action menu. The original message will populate the chat input area for you to make changes.
You can alter the text as needed. Once edited, the message will display "(edited)" to indicate changes were made.
Yes, a message can only be edited up to 10 times to prevent abuse of this feature.

Tap the GIF button located in the Inbox near the text entry bar. The GIF drawer will open to an empty search bar where you can type keywords to find the perfect GIF or browse trending GIFs. Simply tap on the GIF you wish to send. It will automatically send to the chat without closing the GIF drawer, allowing you to send multiple GIFs quickly.
Nope! This feature is free for all of our users. So, make sure to add some life to your chats with some gifs!
Yes, you can continue to select and send GIFs as long as the GIF drawer is open. Each GIF will be sent upon selection.

GIFs are powered by Tenor, providing a vast library of animated images to express any emotion or reaction you might want to share. Tenor also ensures that all GIFs on its platform are safe for work. So you can rest easy knowing you won't be sent a GIF that violates our guidelines.
Yes, you can download any GIF to your device. Simply tap and hold on the GIF in your chat and select 'Download' from the action menu.
Tapping a GIF will open it in a full-screen media viewer, giving you a closer look. Swipe down or tap the screen to exit the full-screen view.

article_title: Display Names

structured_content.content: The Display Name feature allows users to choose a display name for a more personalized experience. Unlike usernames, display names do not need to be unique and can include spaces. This feature makes it easier for users to identify each other by their real or preferred names.

Usernames can often be difficult to remember and may not reflect how you identify your friends in real life. Display names allow for a more personal and familiar way to recognize and connect with friends within the app.
After customizing your avatar, you will be prompted to set your display name.
Display names must be between 1 and 30 characters and cannot contain special characters or formatting.
You can update your display name anytime from your profile settings.
If the field is empty, you will see a placeholder text: ‚ÄúAdd your name so friends can find you.‚Äù
You cannot save a name that is over the character limit of 30 or contains inappropriate words.
Your display name will appear in various places within the app to help others identify you more easily:
Your display name will be the primary identifier, with your username shown in secondary secondarily on your profile and mini-profile screens.
In active friends lists, conversation titles, and message previews, your display name will be shown.
You can search or mention users using either their Display Name or Username.
No, special characters are not allowed in display names. However, spaces are allowed.
There are currently no restrictions on how often you can change your display name.
Yes, your username will still be visible alongside your display name to ensure clarity and prevent impersonation.
If your account is deactivated, your display name will not be visible, and your username will be replaced with ‚Äú[Deactivated].‚Äù
If someone's Display Name is offensive, you can report them and our Trust & Safety team will review your report and take appropriate action.

structured_content.content: üéâ Snap, Share, and Shine! With Highrise's newest feature, Inbox Media, your chats are about to get a whole lot more colorful. Photos
Videos (up to
Selecting Media: Tap the media button to open your device's gallery; here, you can select up to a max of 9 items to share at once.
Sending Media: After selection, hit confirm to send. Your chosen media will then begin to upload with a visible loader on each image or video to show you its progress.

Yes, you can send up to 9 images or a mix of images and videos in a single message. Videos are treated as separate messages if mixed with images and have a max allowed size of 10MB.

Subscribing is easy! You have full control over your subscription through your app store. To upgrade or downgrade, adjust your subscription options directly in the Highrise app, and we'll guide you through the process. If you decide to cancel, you can do so anytime through your app store‚Äôs subscription settings. Remember, the change will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

Highrise+ is designed to make your specific account shine with exclusive benefits. This means the perks are only available on the account where Highrise+ was purchased. If you're enjoying Highrise on multiple accounts and wish for each to have these benefits, you'll need to subscribe to Highrise+ for each account individually.

Note that you cannot tie an app store (Apple App Store or Google Play Store) account to multiple Highrise+ subscriptions. If you want to subscribe on another Highrise account you will need to use another platform account for payment.
If you are a member of the Highrise Creature Club (meaning that you own a Highrise NFT or Highrise LAND, then you will automatically receive HR+ as a perk! No need to subscribe manually!

When your new billing period begins, you'll receive the full amount of gold for your current tier.

article_title: How to Purchase Highrise LAND

structured_content.content: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: Purchasing Highrise LAND is done at your own risk. Blockchain technology is still new and evolving, and there is a risk of scams and other malicious activities. Please stay informed about basic security measures, such as using strong passwords and two-factor authentication, and only use services from trusted sources.
To purchase a Highrise LAND, you will need a Metamask wallet, crypto currency, and to be informed about the basic security measures of the blockchain technology.

A MetaMask wallet is like a digital bank account for your crypto currency. It allows you to store and manage your ETH (Ether) and other digital tokens in a secure, easy-to-use way. You can use your MetaMask wallet to purchase Highrise LAND and access all the perks and benefits that come with owning a plot of LAND.
You should use a computer to use and create a MetaMask Wallet. It's the easiest and safest way. Follow these steps:
Install the MetaMask browser extension from the official website (
Click the MetaMask icon in your browser to open the extension.
Click the "Create a Wallet" button on the welcome screen.
Enter a strong password to protect your wallet and click "Create". Make sure to write down your password and store it in a safe place.
Read and accept the terms of use and privacy policy, then click "All Done".

You will be shown your MetaMask seed phrase, which is a series of 12-24 words that can be used to restore your wallet if you forget your password or lose access to your account. Write down your seed phrase and store it in a safe place.

‚ö†Ô∏è This seed phrase can give anyone permanent full access to your account. Losing it means losing access to your account. Anyone with access to it can also have access to all the assets stored in your wallet. No one will ever ask you to share this information unless they‚Äôre trying to scam you.
Click the "Next" button to continue.
You will be taken to your MetaMask wallet where you can view your accounts, transaction history, and other information.
OpenSea is the marketplace where the Highrise LAND can be purchased. Once you have created a Metamask wallet and added funds, you'll need to connect your wallet to OpenSea via a Metamask extension.
Here‚Äôs how to connect your wallet to OpenSea:
Visit
Choose the Metamask option.
A Metamask popup will show up, press ‚ÄúNext‚Äù, and then ‚ÄúConnect‚Äù.
Your Metamask wallet should now be connected to OpenSea.
To purchase Highrise LAND on OpenSea, you first need to purchase ETH (the crypto currency used to purchase Highrise LAND)
After your wallet has been connected to the OpenSea website (

The easiest way to add funds is using the first option: Credit Card. Simply choose how much ETH you want to buy, and follow the on-screen steps to checkout. After purchasing, your funds will be added to your Metamask wallet instantly.
Alternatively, you can purchase ETH directly through MetaMask in some countries, or by using exchange apps such as

If you have purchased ETH using one of these alternatives, you will need to transfer the funds from the exchange wallet to your Metamask wallet to be able to use it. The exchange app will offer a transfer option in which you'll be required to input your MetaMask wallet address to send the funds.
Note: Transferring ETH requires a small gas fee to process the transaction. To learn more about gas and gas fees, check out:
Choose the LAND plot that you would like to purchase from the OpenSea marketplace (

Press ‚ÄúAdd to cart‚Äù then click on the wallet icon shown in the top right section of your screen. From there, choose your preferred payment option and click "Complete Purchase" to instantly buy the LAND parcel. Alternatively, you may click  ‚ÄúMake an offer‚Äù if you would like to offer a different price to the owner of the LAND parcel. You will be prompted to follow a series of on-screen steps.

‚ö†Ô∏è Unlike Creatures which were launched through Immutable X [a layer two blockchain], false LAND Collections can exist on OpenSea.  To ensure you're accessing the correct LAND collection, only use the official link provided above! ‚ö†Ô∏è

In order to be able to see your Slime-blob pet that is connected to your LAND, as well as receive all of the in-game perks and benefits, you'll need to connect your Metamask wallet to your Highrise account.
Head to
Click over on your profile picture in the top right of the navigation bar. Then click on Settings. You‚Äôll see a section called Blockchain, press the Connect Metamask Wallet button.
A Metamask popup will show up, press Sign. After that your Wallet will have been connected successfully.
üéâ Now that you've integrated your crypto wallet,

You will automatically start receiving all of the benefits and perks for owning a plot of LAND  for as long as your Metamask wallet containing at least one plot remains connected to your Highrise account.
However, LAND owners will still acquire various in-game benefits by having their wallet with their LAND asset connected to Highrise!

article_title: What Are the Benefits of Owning Highrise LAND?

structured_content.content: LAND owners will have the ability to create customizable rooms within their tower; host richer experiences, earn their own income and manage their own economy!

LAND owners will soon be able to link their Highrise Room to their LAND Plots: Highrise Rooms can be linked to plots on the LAND map. This will allows users to access and display deep-links to their room on the map and also give them access to an exclusive boosts on their room‚Äôs max capacity.

LAND Tokens are a custom currency that is similar to Creature Coins. Holders will soon receive LAND Tokens for each standard LAND Plot they own on a daily basis, with a bonus in the case of premium plots. If they own an Estate, they will receive the tokens for each plot that make up the estate.

LAND Tokens will soon be used to purchase furniture from an exclusive shop for LAND owners. All furniture that has ever been released can be found in the shop (with the exception of furniture that has only been used in official rooms, that were sold for gold or were never publicly available). The furniture purchased in the LAND Shop will be account bound.
Boost Tokens and Voice Tokens will also be available in the upcoming LAND Shop.
Exclusive grabs for LAND owners will be periodically released. These grabs contain exclusive furniture items, and even new rare and exclusive versions of the Slime Pets as rewards.

LAND owners will be able to add extra room capacity to the Rooms linked to their LAND plots. If the LAND plot is standard, the room capacity can be boosted up to 75 users. If the plot is Premium, the room capacity can be boosted up to 120 users.
LAND owners will receive surprise Airdrops with miscellaneous furniture items.

LAND owners will have access to the exclusive LAND channel in the official Highrise Discord server. They will have access to periodical giveaways and contests, with rewards of exclusive versions of furniture and even pets.

article_title: What Is the Lucky Wheel?

structured_content.content: What's the Lucky Wheel, you ask? Well, it's your ticket to spinning a wheel of fortune and grabbing some epic rewards. Think bubbles, gold, and even free spins! Talk about winning!

How often can you spin this magical wheel? Once a day, my friend. Yup, you get a free spin every day. But wait, there's more! After your free spin, you can watch a quick ad to score an extra spin on that same day. Double the fun!

Now, let's clear up something important. Can you spin the wheel with multiple accounts? Sorry, no can do. The once-per-day rule applies to all your accounts. So, don't go spinning away on your alternate accounts‚Äîit won't work.
So, when does the Lucky Wheel timer reset? Here's the scoop: It resets at noon UTC for everyone. Time zones don't matter. It's like a global celebration of wheel-spinning goodness!

Now, where can you find this fantastic Lucky Wheel? Look no further! Just tap the 'Spin!' button chilling in the upper-right corner of your screen while you're in a room. Can't spot it? No worries! Check out the handy-dandy photo below for a visual guide. We've got your back!
It's time to unleash the Lucky Wheel magic. Spin away, collect those rewards, and let the good times roll!

article_title: What Is Skypass?

structured_content.content: Hey there! So, what exactly is SkyPass? Well, think of it as the cool sibling of Daily Goals (you remember those, right? They're pretty straightforward!). The best part? SkyPass is absolutely free and open to everyone!

Simply log in and tap the delightful blue icon at the upper left corner of your screen. Voila! You're now on the SkyPass tracks. Here, you'll find a range of tasks, from visiting a trading room to building a sculpture. Complete a goal, and guess what? You'll earn shiny Stars!
Now, let's talk about

As you progress, unlocking each Tier will bring you a variety of awesome rewards. From bubbles and stylish clothing items to Free Spin Tokens and more, there's something for everyone. Be warned though, advancing through Tiers may require hundreds to thousands of Stars. Fear not! You can always purchase Stars with gold to speed up your progress.
Ah, the seasons of SkyPass! They're like magical reward-filled journeys that last around a month or so. Picture this: unique sets of rewards await you during each season. Exciting, right?

Now, let's talk about SkyPass+. It's the VIP upgrade that unlocks an additional rewards track. For only $9.99 per season, you'll get all the regular SkyPass rewards plus extras like bonus gold and snazzy, tradable clothing items. Currently, SkyPass+ is only available as an in-app purchase. Remember, it's a one-time purchase per season, so if you want to keep those amazing SkyPass+ benefits in a new season, you'll need to make another purchase of $9.99.

Imagine this scenario: You decide to get SkyPass+ in the middle of a season. Bam! You instantly unlock the premium rewards for all the reward tiers you've already reached. And that's not all‚Äîevery new tier you conquer from that point onward also grants you both the free and premium rewards. It's like a reward bonanza!

Oops, forgot to claim your rewards before the SkyPass season ended? No worries, we've got you covered! All those fantastic unclaimed rewards will be automatically sent your way at the end of the season. Can't find them in your inventory? Just check Inbox > Gifts, and there they are!

Now, what if you don't see SkyPass at all? Let's troubleshoot! Make sure your device is running iOS 3.16.0 / Android 1.22.0 or a later version. If you're a rookie Highriser, complete your account setup by acing all three challenges of the tutorial with Pedra. If SkyPass isn't active, don't fret! When a season ends, the blue SkyPass icon will turn green, and you'll start receiving bubbles instead of Stars. But don't worry, a new SkyPass season will be on its way soon. Stay tuned!

Got more questions we didn't cover? Spotted a major issue or have a brilliant suggestion? We want to hear from you! Visit highrise.canny.io to share your feedback directly with the devs. Since this is a brand-new feature, your input means the world to us!
Get ready to embark on an exciting journey with SkyPass. Happy exploring and enjoy those awesome rewards!

article_title: What Are Progress Rewards?

structured_content.content: Think of Progress Rewards as delightful bonuses you get for spinning grabs and collecting new items - a little treat on your journey to that coveted Legendary!

Spin and win! Unlock Progress Rewards by spinning and nabbing unique items from a grab. All Rare and Epic items help fill your Progress Meter, but duplicates don't count. The Progress Rewards usually pop up halfway or 3/4 of the way towards the total items needed to snag the grab's Legendary.

Take a grab with 16 items, for example. You'd get the Progress Reward after spinning and winning 10 unique items out of 16. This reward doesn't count towards unlocking the Legendary ‚Äì it's just a pat on the back for getting closer to your goal!

Grabs with Progress Rewards have an extra Progress Reward Meter under the standard Completion Reward Meter. It shows your current tally of unique items and how many more you need for the Progress Reward.

Easy peasy! Once your Progress Meter is full, the Progress Reward is auto-claimed. Spin that final item, and a fancy animation will pop up with your reward. Tap on the grab ball and boom! Your reward is in your closet inventory.
Extra Queries?
Initially, yes. Our first couple of grabs with Progress Rewards use account-bound items. But we're all for shaking things up. Keep an eye out ‚Äì who knows what might pop up next!
Not at all! Different grabs need varying numbers of items to complete. So, the count of items needed to unlock Progress Rewards can differ too.

Absolutely! After claiming the Legendary and finishing the grab, all progress resets. Your Progress and Completion Meters hit zero, and you can spin the grab from scratch, unlocking all its rewards as many times as you wish. Let the fun begin...again!

article_title: What are the Reward Probabilities for Grabs owned by Highrise?

structured_content.content: On a Grab screen, click the little info icon underneath the Grab's name.  This will bring up the Spin Rates for that grab and any Swap Rates (if that grab has swapping enabled)
No, Spin Rates are not the same for all Grabs and change very often. We recommend checking the Spin Rates before you begin spinning any grab.
While it might be some bad luck, it's most definitely not rigged. The common misconception here is not realizing each spin is an independent variable.

Imagine our game's spins like reaching into a bag of 100 marbles, where 10 are red (winning marbles) and 90 are blue. Each spin is like pulling out a marble, checking its color, and then putting it back. No matter how many times you reach in, your chance of pulling out a red marble is always 10%.

Just like pulling marbles from the bag, each game spin is an independent event. This means that spinning 100 times doesn't guarantee you'll pull out 10 red marbles. It's completely possible to have a streak of blue ones because every spin is a fresh chance, not affected by the previous or future spins.

article_title: What are Second-Hand Grabs?

structured_content.content: Second-hand grabs are like your personal vending machines for grabs! Place them in your room, stuff them with your items, and let other players try their luck. The best part? You keep 70% of all the gold your machine rakes in.

Think of it as your own mini lottery. You can add or remove items whenever you want and set the draw price anywhere from 1 to 99,999 gold. You also get to set the odds for different rarity levels (Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, and Legendary).
Relax! The probability percentage is always displayed on Second-hand Grabs. So, if you're feeling lucky, give it a whirl!
Here's the scoop: when all items of a specific rarity are drawn, that rarity's odds get added to the lowest remaining one. So, if your Rare items run out, their odds get passed on to the Common ones.
Absolutely! You can see who drew from your grab, what they got, and how much gold they spent, all through the handy history button on the Second-hand Grab interface.

Visitors can view your username, check out the odds, draw from the grab, and keep track of updates and wins. They'll also get notified if you disable the grab or if all items are drawn. It's as transparent as a freshly cleaned window!

article_title: What Are Grabs and Spinning?

structured_content.content: Ever heard of treasure hunting in the digital realm? Welcome to the world of 'Grabs'! These are sets of items that pop up in the game, often several times a week, waiting to be won. Find them in the Shop, give them a whirl, and you could bag some pretty cool stuff!
So, where's the treasure map, you ask? Tap on the Shop icon in your bottom menu, and there, under 'Featured Grabs', is your X marks the spot.

If we've got a live event going on (which we change every week), you can find new grabs in the Event Room. Tap on the event icon in the lower right of your home room screen, navigate to the top of the event menu, and click "Go to Event Room". It's a surprise party for your inventory!

Now, what treasures can you dig up? Grabs are like candy bags, filled with all sorts of items in different 'Rarities', or drop rates. These include Uncommon, Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary items. Usually, a grab bag has mostly Rare items with a few elusive Epics. Legendary items? They're the golden ticket, only available when you've spun and won every item in the grab.

But wait, there's more! We've got 'Limited-Time Legendaries'‚Äîextra special items you can win by completing a grab. The catch? They're like shooting stars, here one minute, gone the next. So be quick and grab them before they're gone!

You can win a Legendary more than once! After you claim all your rewards and get your Legendary prize, your grab resets. This means you can keep spinning and keep winning, even those sweet Legendaries! So spin away, my friend, the digital world is your oyster.

article_title: Why Do Items Have Different Rarities?

structured_content.content: Every item in Highrise has its own unique value, and not all items are created equal! Some items are rarer, and as such, they hold more value in the marketplace and there are fewer of them in Highrise.
Each item falls into one of four categories: Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary. This is a measure of an item's rarity and value, with Legendary items being the most rare and valuable.

When you spin in the game (which is based on chance), for gold grabs, you'll receive either a ‚Äúrare‚Äù item or an ‚Äúepic‚Äù item. Rare items will drop more frequently than Epic items. Once you've spun and received every item in a gold grab, you'll be rewarded with a Legendary item!
On the other hand, for bubble grabs, you're more likely to spin a common item than a rare one. However, once you've won all items in a bubble grab, you'll receive the Epic item for the set.

Keep in mind that gold grabs expire sooner than bubble grabs. That's why you might see some players wearing items that aren't currently available in our shop. Don't worry, though, as most items from expired grabs can be purchased from other players in the trade section or with gold. So, keep spinning and trading to collect all your favorite items!

: Discover the thrill of meeting people from places you can't pronounce! Just step into an open room and start chatting. You never know who you might meet - maybe even someone who can teach you how to say 'hello' in Klingon!

: Dive into building contests, player-made games, and epic events. Will you become the next Highrise celebrity?
Playing Highrise is as simple as a game of peekaboo ‚Äì just show up, express yourself, and most importantly, have fun! Welcome to your new virtual playground!

article_title: What are the Highrise Community Guidelines?

structured_content.content: We love bringing people together through play at Highrise. That‚Äôs why we built it! The friendships that are formed by thousands of people on Highrise every day are what drive us to create this special world. And we plan on continuing to build and evolve our world for as long as we can.

To create wholesome content and interact with other players in positive ways that foster friendships and exploration. You should never interact with players with the intent of being negative or discouraging. You should also never create content with the intent to anger other players or illicit adverse reactions.
- Meeting new people and making friends.
You‚Äôll find our community guidelines below. Please make sure to review and follow them to ensure you have a fantastic experience on Highrise.
You must be

We take the safety of all of our young players seriously. This is one of our most important guidelines and is a high priority for our trust and safety team. We have a zero-tolerance policy and do not allow any type of actions that could put our young players in danger or inappropriate situations. This includes but is not limited to the following:
- Any sexualization of children
- Child grooming or any type of predatory behavior
All confirmed reports of child endangerment will be reported to the authorities via The National Center for Missing & Exploited Children or other relevant legal channels.

Highrise is a safe place to make friends and build experiences. It is not the place for any type of sexually graphic or gratifying content or behavior. Sharing text posts, photos, videos, audio, or participating in NSFW chats is not allowed, and will result in a permanent suspension if persistent inappropriate behavior is discovered.

Any illegal activities are prohibited on Highrise. If we discover any players violating the law, it may result in a permanent suspension of your account. This includes, but is not limited to:
- Posting content that includes or promotes the use of illegal narcotics
Do not engage in or post content encouraging the harassment or bullying of individuals or communities. If someone is harassing you or your community, be proactive and block them immediately.

We don‚Äôt allow any hate speech, which includes but is not limited to: racist, homophobic, sexist, or hateful religious remarks. We will take action against any hateful conduct. We respect all communities and protected classes and do our best to ensure they have a safe experience on Highrise.
Sharing content that is directly threatening someone's physical or financial state. Do not threaten to harm other players in any way. This includes, but is not limited to:

Do not share or threaten to share the personal information of another player. This includes but is not limited to:

Circumventing tools that enable players to protect themselves and/or repeatedly targeting a player with unwanted friend requests or messages. If a player has blocked you, you‚Äôll need to respect their decision. This includes any content that encourages others to cut or injure themselves; embrace anorexia, bulimia, or other eating disorders; or commit suicide rather than for example, seeking counseling or treatment. This is unsafe, as there is no guarantee of either party honoring the transaction. Buying accounts, items, or gold for money outside of the Highrise trading system will result in the removal of those items and possibly a temporary/permanent suspension.

Accounts cannot be traded, sold, or given away. All accounts must be used by their original creator. If you advertise that you are buying, selling, or giving away an account, you may be temporarily suspended or even permanently banned. If you violate this guideline and it results in you being scammed, our concierge team will not be able to help.

Attempting to steal another player‚Äôs account will result in a permanent ban. This includes sending password requests to support for accounts that don‚Äôt belong to you, brute force hacking another player‚Äôs account or any other method of account theft.
Spamming is not permitted on Highrise. Spamming is defined as the following actions performed on a mass scale which includes, but is not limited to:
- Making multiple comments of the same message with the intent to disrupt players
- Using macros, scripts, or any other methods to spam in a room chat

Do not create impostor accounts pretending to be a Highrise staff member, a celebrity, or another player. Be who you wanna be, but don‚Äôt attempt to use someone else‚Äôs authority or reputation to influence the community.
Witch-hunting sounds like a great pastime if you live in 17th-century New England. However, we don‚Äôt allow any form of witch-hunting on Highrise.

We do not allow players to create new accounts to circumvent a suspension. All suspensions will last until their expiration or a successful appeal. If you‚Äôve been suspended permanently, then we have decided to no longer allow you to use our application in any capacity unless otherwise stated. If you decide to create a new account to circumvent a suspension, then it is subject to being suspended as well.
Submitting false or dishonest refund requests to Apple, Google, or Highrise directly may result in your account being permanently suspended.
Our reporting tool helps us keep the community safe, but don‚Äôt misuse it! Sending false reports, faking evidence, or sending multiple reports about the same issue is prohibited.

If you‚Äôre experiencing a particular issue, like missing gold from an in-app purchase or a technical glitch, feel free to contact us from FAQ & Support, and we‚Äôd be more than happy to assist you. However, please note that submitting false requests to our support team may result in a permanent suspension of your account. Some false requests include but are not limited to:
- Sending requests containing false information or information cherry-picked with the intent to manipulate our concierge staff.
- Requesting access to accounts that do not belong to you.
Consequences and actions:
- Breaking our guidelines can result in a warning, mute, temporary suspension, or permanent ban. The actions we take are decided on a case-by-case basis and at our discretion.
